verses.content: Chuongchun, Isak chun Jakob chu a ko a, mal a sâwm a, thu a pêk bawk a, a kuomah, “Kanaan ram nunghâkhai laia mi hi nuhmeiin i nei ding a ni nawh.
Tho la, Paddan-aram rama i nu pa, Bethuel inah fe la, chutaka mi i nu ṭapa Laban naunuhmeihai laia mi chu nuhmeiin va nei rawh.
Pathien Iengkimthawthei chun mal sâwm chein, hnam tamtak um khâwm hung ni dingin chi tamtak inthlatir chein, sukpung raw se che.
Mikhuol i nina ram, Pathienin Abraham kuoma a pêk hi i hluo theina dingin Abraham malsâwmna chu indawngtir bawk raw se che, nang le i thlahai khawm,” a tih a.
Chuongchun, Isakin Jakob chu ân fe hmangtir a: chun, Paddan-aram rama Jakob le Esau nu Rebeka ṭapa Aram mi Bethuel naupa Laban kuoma chun a fe tah a.
Chun, Esau chun Isakin Jakob mal a sâwm a, nuhmei nei dingin Paddan-aram ramah ân fe hmangtir ti le, mal a sâwm laiin, “Kanaan nunghâkhai laia mi hi nuhmeiah i nei ding a ni nawh,” tiin thu a pêk ti,
le Jakobin a nu le pa thu awiin Paddan-aram ramah a fe tah ti a hriet a.
Chuonga Esauin Kanaan nu- nghâkhai chun a pa Isak lung chu an buo naw hle ti a hriet chun,
Esau chu Ismael kuomah a va feh a, Abraham naupa Ismael naunu Mahalath, Nebaioth farnu chu, nuhmei dingin a nuhmei nei sahai bâka chun a va nei sa tah a.
Jakob chu Beer-sebaa inthawk- in a suok a, Haran tieng a pan tah a.
Chun, hmun ieng amanih a hang tlung a, nisa a tla ta leiin chutaka chun a riek tah a. Chu hmuna lung pakhat chu a lâk a, lukhamah a hmang a, chu hmuna chun in dingin a zâl tah a.
Chun, mang a nei a, hnuoi chunga hin leilâk a lo indawh a, a tâwp chun vân a sun a; a chunga chun Pathien vântirkohai ṭum le kaiin a hmuh a.
A tâwpa chun LALPA a ngîr a, “Kei hi LALPA i pu Abraham Pathien le Isak Pathien chu ka nih, i zâlna hnuoi kha i kuoma le i thlahai kuomah la pêng ka ti cheu;
i thlahai chu hnuoia pilvut zâtin la um an ta, thlangtieng dâm, sak- tieng dâm, hmârtieng dâm, simtieng dâm indar lien i ta, nangma le i thlahaia chun khawvêla hnam tin la thawveng an tih.
Ngai ta, i kuomah ka um a, i fena taphawtah vêng pei ka ti cheh a, hi rama hin ṭhuoi kîr nâwk ka ti che: i kuoma ka hril hi ka thaw hmakhat chun thlathlam naw ning che,” a tih a.
Chun, Jakob chu a in a hung har a, “Hi hmuna hin LALPA chu a um ngei el, ka lo hriet si nawh,” a tih a.
Chun, a ṭih a, “Hi hmun hi ṭi a va um ngei de! Hi hi hmun dang a ni nawh a, Pathien in a lo ni hi tie, hi hi vân kawtkhâr a lo ni hi,” a tih a.
Chun, Jakob chu zîngtieng inhmatakin a tho a, lung a ilukham chu a lâk a, lungphun dingin a phun a, a sîpa chun sahriek a buok a.
Chu hmun hminga chun Bethel ân bûk a, a khaw hming hmasa chu Luz a nih.
Chun, Jakob chun thu a tiem tah a, “Pathien ka kuomah a um a, hi ka fena lampuia hin mi vêng a, fâk ding bei le sil ding silfên a mi pêk a,
chuonga ka pa in tienga thlamuongtaka ka hung kîr nâwk phawt chun, LALPA chu ka Pathien nîng a ta,
hi lungphun ka phun khawm hi Pathien in nîng a tih: chun, ka kuoma i mi pêk ding po poa chun sâwma pakhat chu pe ngei ngei ka ti che,” tiin.
